sections.heading: Definitions

Definitions. As used in this chapter, the following terms have the following meanings unless the context clearly indicates otherwise:(1)“Campaign fund raiser” means an affair held to raise funds to be used in a campaign for public office
sections.text: (2)“Campaign treasurer” means an individual appointed by a candidate or pol

sections.heading: 106.30-106.36 may be cited as the “Florida Election Campaign Financing Act.”
sections.text: 106.30-106.36 may be cited as the “Florida Election Campaign Financing Act.”

sections.heading: Election Campaign Financing Trust Fund.—(1)There is hereby established in the State Treasury an1Election Campaign Financing Trust Fund to be utilized by the Department of State as provided in ss
